policy_content:
Privacy Policy

Na Plataforma GuestAcess reconhecemos a importância do tratamento dos dados At the GuestAcess Platform we recognize the importance of processing the personal data entrusted to us, so we are committed to treating your personal data in a safe, complete and conﬁdential manner, taking into account only certain, explicit and legitimate purposes.

1. Who is responsible for processing personal data?

Your personal data will be processed by NEST - Tourism Innovation Center, a company based in Praça do Município, 6200-151 Covilhã.

2. Who are the holders of personal data?

The person who decides to register the WebApp to perform the quizz.

3. Why do we need to collect and process your personal data?

The personal data provided, in connection with the use of the “Platform”, will be processed and stored computerized, in a database speciﬁcally created for this purpose.

4. How long do we keep your personal data?

NEST keeps your personal data only for the period strictly necessary to pursue the purpose that determined its collection. In the absence of a speciﬁc legal obligation, your data will be processed only for the period necessary to fulﬁll the purposes that motivated its collection, and as long as there are legitimate grounds that allow its preservation by NEST.

NEST also guarantees the fulﬁllment of the obligations foreseen in this policy and the adoption of the technical and organizational measures necessary to comply with the principles and rules registered in the GDPR.

NEST guarantees the applicability and compliance with all the rights of the holder of personal data provided for in the General Data Protection Regulation and national legislation in force.

NEST makes use of physical, technological, organizational and security measures appropriate to the protection of your personal data in order to protect the personal data that is made available to us, against its dissemination, loss, misuse, alteration, treatment or unauthorized access .

If you want to clarify any doubts or submit a complaint, you can do so through the following email address: nest@innovtourism.pt

NEST reserves the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Therefore, it is recommended that you periodically consult this policy on the GuestAccess platform to keep yourself informed about the processing of your personal data.
password_rules: Password must have: 8 characters, 1 letter and 1 number
